user.title: Configure SharedCam
user.description: Set up a camera stream shared via a standalone go2rtc instance.

data_description.go2rtc_url: Base URL of the standalone go2rtc instance (e.g. https://go2rtc-shared.example.com)
data_description.frigate_url: RTSP base URL of your Frigate instance. Auto-populated from Frigate's configured host on port 8554 when Frigate is loaded; adjust if your RTSP port differs.
data_description.camera_name: go2rtc stream name from Frigate's config. Auto-populated as a dropdown when Frigate is loaded; enter manually otherwise.
data_description.friendly_name: Human-readable label used in entity names

data_description.show_viewers: When disabled, the /status endpoint will not send the live count to the viewer.
data_description.status_template: Jinja2 template rendered to a plain string and surfaced as `status` in the /status JSON endpoint and SSE stream. May reference any HA entity state or attribute. Leave blank to omit.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to reach go2rtc-shared API. Check the URL and network access.
error.camera_exists: A camera with this name is already configured.
